TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
You press the button, and infinite food spews forth, drowning the earth in various foods.

I wish for my favorite book series to be real.

Granted. They accidentally create a black hole, killing everyone.

I wish Jeb was real...

Granted. He crashes his rocket(s) into your house and everyone dies.

I wish I could go to space (in a rocket and spacesuit of course )

granted, its a broken spacesuit

i wish i had a potato

Granted, the potato is mutated by nuclear fuel Jeb spilled.

I wish I was bread.

Granted. That's basically it. (You are eaten...)

I wish I could get to food without getting up...

Granted. Right then, the Moon crashes into Earth and everyone survives. All of the food is vapourised.

I wish KSP 1.1 came out about now.

Granted. It reverts to KSP 0.7.3.

I wish I could remove EA.

Edited September 20, 2015 by Yukon0009

Granted. I will go against game rules and will NOT corrupt it. This MUST happen.

I wish the world wasn't dying.

granted, instead you die slowy with all the pain in the world

i wish the space shuttle was used again

Granted. The opposite of the Challenger happens, no one was monitering altitude and throttle. And you are the only one inside.

I wish I could be an SSTO boss in real life

Granted. The opposite of the Challenger happens, no one was monitering altitude and throttle. And you are the only one inside.

I wish I could be an SSTO boss in real life

Granted, but your new SSTOs have no way to go home.

I wish that I could have a hot girlfriend.

Granted. She is on fire and burns you.

I wish for KSP IVAs to be more useful

granted, but they crash the game too

i wish there was a self destruct button on ksp

Granted. It destructs the person using it(that would be you)

I wish I could think of more ingenious ways to corrupt wishes.

Granted. You corrupt your own.

I wish I could get out of this orbit between Jool and Eeloo

Granted. You are now on a suborbital trajectory around the sun.

I want a lawyer.

Granted he sucks your funds dry

i wish for a wunderwaffe dg2

Granted. You have a wunderwaffe dg2. The downside is that you have been taken into the C.O.D Zombies franchise and once you're in... there's no escape!

- I want some ice cream...

Granted. It's molten.

I wish for 8GB more RAM on my laptop.

Wish granted, but your laptop turns into an Epson HX-20 (first ever laptop).

I wish for world peace.

granted, but its between fish

i wish for free mi-24
im so sorry your ram is molten
-1 for not wishing. I wish to corrupt others' wisheS in the funniest way possible.

Granted. People stop posting on the thread, and everyone on the forum abandons you.

I wish I could build a working SSTO.
